attributes.description: Text to display in lieu of multimedia display/replay.
attributes.name: alternate_text

attributes.description: URI reference to electronic information stored outside the record as a file, database entry etc, if supplied as a reference.
attributes.name: uri

attributes.description: The actual data found at `_uri_`, if supplied inline.
attributes.name: data

attributes.description: Data media type coded from openEHR code set  media types  (interface for the IANA MIME types code set).
attributes.name: media_type

attributes.description: Compression type, a coded value from the openEHR Integrity check code set. Void means no compression.
attributes.name: compression_algorithm

attributes.description: Type of integrity check, a coded value from the openEHR `Integrity check` code set.
attributes.name: integrity_check_algorithm

attributes.description: The thumbnail for this item, if one exists; mainly for graphics formats.
attributes.name: thumbnail

attributes.description: Original size in bytes of unencoded encapsulated data. I.e. encodings such as base64, hexadecimal etc do not change the value of this attribute.
attributes.name: size

functions.meaning: Computed from the value of the `_uri_` attribute: True if  the data is stored externally to the record, as indicated by `_uri_`. A copy may also be stored internally, in which case `_is_expanded_` is also true.
functions.name: is_external

functions.meaning: Computed from the value of the data attribute. True if  the  data is stored  in  expanded  form, ie within the EHR itself.
functions.name: is_inline

functions.meaning: Computed from the value of the `_compression_algorithm_` attribute: True if  the  data is stored in compressed form.
functions.name: is_compressed

functions.meaning: Computed from the value of the `_integrity_check_algorithm_` attribute: True if an integrity check has been computed.
functions.name: has_integrity_check

meta_info.description: A specialisation of `DV_ENCAPSULATED` for audiovisual and bio-signal types. Includes further metadata relating to multimedia types which are not applicable to other subtypes of `DV_ENCAPSULATED`.
meta_info.name: DV_MULTIMEDIA
